import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import Sidebar from './Sidebar'; import Loader from "../layouts/loader"; import MetaData from '../layouts/MetaData'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { getAdminProducts,clearErrors } from '../../actions/productActions'; import { getAllUsers } from '../../actions/userActions'; import {getAllOrders} from "../../actions/orderActions"; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import "../../App.css"; const Dashboard = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {products} = useSelector(state=>state.products); const { users } = useSelector(state => state.allUsers) const {orders,loading,amount} = useSelector(state=>state.allOrder); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAdminProducts()) dispatch(getAllOrders()); dispatch(getAllUsers()); }, [dispatch]) let outOfStock = 0; products.forEach(product=>{ if(product.stock==0){ outOfStock+=1; } }) return (

Dashboard

{loading?:( <>
Total Amount
${amount}
Products
{products && products.length}
View Details
Orders
{orders && orders.length}
View Details
Users
{users && users.length}
View Details
Out of Stock
{outOfStock}
)}
) } export default Dashboard
